page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL STORIES
page.content:
There is a castle just out of Grantown. It is called Castle Grant it is supposed to be haunted by a piper and a green lady. The story is that a piper said he could pipe all the way to Inverness and back and round the castle three times. He made it to Inverness and back, but on the third time round the castle he collapsed and died of exhaustion.
The story about the green lady is this, a lady of the castle went with this man who lived in Huntlys Cave. The lady's father wanted her to marry this rich man but she wanted to marry the man who lived in Huntlys cave. Her father locked her up in a small room and locked the door. A good few years later they opened the door and there was nothing there.
